items.title: Climate, infra will dominate India investments, says BII's Asia head Srini Nagarajan
items.description: British International Investment has invested around $2.5 billion in India so far across firms, including Mahindra Electric and Tata Capital

items.title: Thangamayil Jewellery: Will this stock keep its sparkle intact?
items.description: Thangamayil Jewellery Limited is among the few listed jewellery companies with a strong brand, a loyal customer base, and strong return ratios.

items.title: This general insurer’s profitability bucks the industry trend
items.description: The shift in product mix towards health should augur well for ICICI Lombard

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg says he considered spinning off Instagram in 2018
items.description: Zuckerberg wondered whether Meta Platforms Inc., then known as Facebook Inc., “should consider the extreme step of spinning Instagram out as a separate company.”

items.title: Nvidia says new limits on China exports to cost $5.5 billion
items.description: The government informed Nvidia on Monday that the H20 would require a license to export to China “for the indefinite future,” the company said in a regulatory filing Tuesday.
